name: Cash Dunk－ Shoot Some Hoops
description:
Dunk the falling basketballs to score the most points! The most fun and challenging game for everyone! Avoid the bombs and beat your highest score. It's not as easy as it looks!

One mistake and you're out! Simple as that!

Features:
- Tap and drag to play
- No Ads
- Free to Play
- Challenge your friends
